New Records: Virat Kohli equaled Sachin Tendulkar's record of 49 ODI hundreds
Key Match Events: India beat South Africa by 243 runs
Ravindra Jadeja took 5 wickets for 14 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed his emotions about equaling Tendulkar's record
India's win boosted their morale ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa's Ngidi suffered a potential hamstring injury
